name: Lively, Inc.
headline: Modern employee benefits & health savings account (HSA) provider
description:
Out-of-pocket healthcare costs are skyrocketing and every day, people all across America are forced to make difficult decisions about their health. 

Lively is the benefits solutions provider that gets it right. We designed our solutions to take the guesswork out of managing benefits. And our innovative features are built to simplify benefits administration and evolve with your business. Managing wellness and wealth takes more than a series of transactions. By combining robust features with unparalleled service, we make benefits administration effortless, even when time and energy are limited. Experience benefits administration as it should be with Lively.

Go to www.livelyme.com to learn about how HSAs other modern employee benefits can help you and your team.

# 
Best HSA for individuals and companies
Flexible Benefits, Made Easy
Discover our top-rated HSA for consumers and full suite of easy-to-use, flexible employee benefits for businesses and benefit consultants.
[Open an HSA](https://livelyme.com/<https:/secure.livelyme.com/signup/start>)[Lively for businesses](https://livelyme.com/</employers>)

WHY LIVELY
### Loved by account holders, trusted by employers, recommended by brokers
#### The Lively customer experience raises the bar in the benefit solutions industry, with Lively leading the charge in:
  * **Exceptional customer support** , with customer satisfaction ratings that are more than 3 times higher than the industry average.*
  *  **Technology built for today** , thoughtfully designed to be easy-to-use and dependable. Plus, we can rapidly update our platforms and personalize employer experiences.
  * **Taking the burden off employers,** with robust education and resources, crafted to continuously drive usage and adoption for employees.


Explore how our suite of benefits save employers time and money, while driving employee satisfaction.
[Discover more](https://livelyme.com/</employers>)

### Transparent HSA pricing. Zero hidden fees.
INDIVIDUALS

  * HSA cash balance is insured and interest bearing*

BUSINESSES

Per Employee Per Month (PEPM) (A monthly minimum of $50 may apply)

  * Intuitive dashboard administration
  * Effortless contribution management
  * Personalized investment options


[Get Started](https://livelyme.com/<https:/secure.livelyme.com/signup/start>)[Contact us for preferred pricing](https://livelyme.com/</contact-sales>)
* Lively is not an FDIC or NCUA insured financial institution. Lively partners with financial institutions in order to provide its products. These financial institutions are FDIC or NCUA insured and your HSA account may be eligible for pass through insurance. Certain conditions must be satisfied for pass-through deposit insurance coverage to apply. Please contact Lively for more detailed information.
REPORT
## 80% of benefits leaders say offering competitive financial benefits is more important than a year ago.
Lively’s third annual [_Employee Benefits Pulse Check_](https://livelyme.com/<https:/lively.foleon.com/resource/employee-benefits-pulse-check-2024-sharing/>) report identifies the key stressors on benefits leaders minds and what they need from their benefits providers in order to combat them in 2025, including: 
  * The rising cost of health insurance and employee financial stress.
  * The challenges of benefits education to drive employee adoption.
  * Why customer service and streamlined integration are key differentiators for benefits providers.
  * How benefits providers can enable key features and customer service to support benefits leaders and their team.


[Read now](https://livelyme.com/<https:/lively.foleon.com/resource/employee-benefits-pulse-check-2024-sharing/>)

### Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
Am I eligible to open an HSA? 
You are eligible to open a Health Savings Account if you are:
  * Covered under an HSA-eligible High Deductible Health Plan
  * Not enrolled in Medicare
  * Not enrolled in a Healthcare/General Purpose Flexible Spending Account
  * You're not covered by any other secondary health insurance plan
  * Cannot be claimed as a dependent on someone else’s tax return


What is Lively?
Lively is the flexible benefits solutions provider that gets it right. We designed our solutions to take the guesswork out of managing benefits and our innovative features are built to simplify benefits administration and evolve with your business. By combining robust features with unparalleled service, we make benefits administration effortless, even when time and energy are limited. Experience benefits administration as it should be with Lively. Lively currently offers HSA, FSA, HRA, COBRA, Direct Bill, Lifestyle Spending Accounts, and Medical Travel Accounts.
What are flexible benefits?
Flexible benefits are saving and spending accounts, and other perks like paid time-off that are offered by employers and are optional for employees to participate in. These benefits can be pre- or post- tax contribution accounts and non-monetary benefits like professional development and wellness initiatives. By offering flexible benefits, employers empower employees to customize their benefits package in a way that best meets their unique needs and goals. Flexible benefits can also help improve employers' recruitment and retention efforts and improve employee engagement.
What flexible benefits does Lively offer?
Lively currently offers Health Savings Accounts (HSA) for individuals and employer groups and employer-sponsored savings and spending accounts, including Flexible Spending Accounts (FSA), Lifestyle Spending Accounts (LSA), Health Reimbursement Arrangements (HRA), Medical Travel Accounts (MTA), and COBRA and Direct Bill. 
What makes Lively different from other providers?
Lively was built to create a better, easier-to-use benefits experience and save our account holders and administrators time and money. Our unparalleled, responsive, knowledgeable customer service and account holder education, innovative features, and technology built in-house enables easy set up and simple administration. Our customer satisfaction rating (NPS) is nearly triple the industry average and we’re the fastest growing HSA-provider in the market. Our solutions are simple, trusted, and reliable. In short, they just work.

FDIC or NCUA insurance covers the failure of the insured financial institution. Lively partners with financial institutions in order to provide its products. These [financial institutions](https://livelyme.com/</financial-institution-partner>) are FDIC or NCUA insured and your HSA account may be eligible for pass through insurance. Any investment products are not insured by the FDIC; not deposits or obligations of the bank or its affiliates; not guaranteed by the bank or its affiliates; and are subject to investment risk, including possible loss of principal.
The Lively Visa® Benefit Access Debit Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank, N.A., Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. No ATM or cash access allowed.

### Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
Am I eligible to open an HSA? 
You are eligible to open a Health Savings Account if you are:
  * Covered under an HSA-eligible High Deductible Health Plan
  * Not enrolled in Medicare
  * Not enrolled in a Healthcare/General Purpose Flexible Spending Account
  * You're not covered by any other secondary health insurance plan
  * Cannot be claimed as a dependent on someone else’s tax return


What is Lively?
Lively is the flexible benefits solutions provider that gets it right. We designed our solutions to take the guesswork out of managing benefits and our innovative features are built to simplify benefits administration and evolve with your business. By combining robust features with unparalleled service, we make benefits administration effortless, even when time and energy are limited. Experience benefits administration as it should be with Lively. Lively currently offers HSA, FSA, HRA, COBRA, Direct Bill, Lifestyle Spending Accounts, and Medical Travel Accounts.
What are flexible benefits?
Flexible benefits are saving and spending accounts, and other perks like paid time-off that are offered by employers and are optional for employees to participate in. These benefits can be pre- or post- tax contribution accounts and non-monetary benefits like professional development and wellness initiatives. By offering flexible benefits, employers empower employees to customize their benefits package in a way that best meets their unique needs and goals. Flexible benefits can also help improve employers' recruitment and retention efforts and improve employee engagement.
What flexible benefits does Lively offer?
Lively currently offers Health Savings Accounts (HSA) for individuals and employer groups and employer-sponsored savings and spending accounts, including Flexible Spending Accounts (FSA), Lifestyle Spending Accounts (LSA), Health Reimbursement Arrangements (HRA), Medical Travel Accounts (MTA), and COBRA and Direct Bill. 
What makes Lively different from other providers?
Lively was built to create a better, easier-to-use benefits experience and save our account holders and administrators time and money. Our unparalleled, responsive, knowledgeable customer service and account holder education, innovative features, and technology built in-house enables easy set up and simple administration. Our customer satisfaction rating (NPS) is nearly triple the industry average and we’re the fastest growing HSA-provider in the market. Our solutions are simple, trusted, and reliable. In short, they just work.

generated_description:
Lively, Inc., founded in 2016 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W17, is shaking up the employee benefits space with a focused mission to simplify health savings accounts (HSAs) and modern employee benefits. Based in San Francisco with a team of 195, Lively understands the burden of rising out-of-pocket healthcare costs faced by many Americans. Their approach isn’t just about transactions; it’s about seamlessly integrating benefits management into the lives of employees and employers alike.

Lively offers a suite of solutions that includes HSAs, Flexible Spending Accounts (FSAs), Health Reimbursement Arrangements (HRAs), and more, all delivered with a tech-forward, user-friendly platform. They aim to eliminate guesswork in benefits administration, ensuring that companies can efficiently manage wellness and financial health without additional hassle. Their technology is built for today’s needs—flexible, adaptive, and straightforward.

What sets Lively apart is not just their robust offerings, but also their commitment to outstanding customer support. They boast customer satisfaction ratings that are three times higher than the industry average, reflecting their focus on user experience and service. Over 98% of employers who choose Lively continue to partner with them, underscoring their effectiveness and reliability.

Lively also champions transparency in pricing. For individuals, their HSA comes with zero fees—a rarity in the industry. For businesses, the cost is just $2.95 per employee per month (with a minimum monthly fee), making it an excellent value for comprehensive benefits management.

In a world where employee benefits are rapidly evolving and becoming increasingly essential, Lively offers a reliable solution that's designed to enhance satisfaction for both employees and employers. 

To dive deeper into how Lively can align with your health savings and benefits strategy, visit their website at [Lively](https://livelyme.com).
